attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Andy Burnham is looking to bring in a compulsory insurance scheme to make people pay £20000 for future health care cost whether they need them or not.This could be a compulsory insurance for everyone of us to pay. Arnt we all poor enough as it is and dont we pay enough! And what happens if we dont need it?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
